sub_title: Founder GeoTechnicSolutions, Changemaker, Business Development/Consultant on GIS and Geophysics, Geothermal, Technological Innovation for a just Green Transition, Climate Change expert working group member at IRMA
summary: Working the past 15+ years in the global oil and gas industry, I have worked and managed challenging technical  projects, connecting the right people in multidisciplinary teams and working with complex data sets, to deliver optimal results. Now, I look forward to collaborate and deliver sustainable solutions to social and environmental/biodiversity challenges.

To realize the green industrial revolution and energy transition, we have collectively committed to the need for rare metals, a lot of them. To produce our wind-turbines, electrolysis , batteries , electric vehicles, solar panels , data centers etc etc . Design to recycle is currently not meeting the demand. 
The demand for rare metals  in Europe is projected to increase tenfold by 2050. For Lithium even sixty-fold. For Cobalt fifteen-fold.
“The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.” –Socrates 

 We offer a range of consulting and technological services  to help optimize  your projects  to be the most sustainable and ecofriendly possible.  
The clean-tech and digital sector are competing for the same supply of rare metals. We recognize the need for precious mineral  and renewable energy resources  (e.g. rare  metals and geothermal) to fuel the Green Transition AND the importance to do this with respect to ecosystems and indigenous communities.
Our extensive network of government agencies , NGO's , innovation start-ups, companies  and universities helps secure access to the latest technologies.
We will help you achieve international standards for responsible business and mining practices and get the right accreditation.
